ModMetaData.name: [1.1, 1.2] Holy Washer (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description: Holy Washer adds the ability for pawns to wash off tainted effect from clothes the "pragmatic" way. No more taint on that apparel! Disclaimer: Requires research and using a wash basin or washing machine. We are not responsible for your colonists profiteering from operating a cannibalist laundromat colony. PACKAGE CONTENTS [Production Building] Wash Basin - allows pawns to wash tainted clothes manually. Requires Basic Washing research. [Production Building] Washing Machine - allows clothes to be washed with electricity at a faster rate. Requires Advanced Washing research. [Research Topics] Basic Washing, Advanced Washing PACKAGE NOTES Update of Bukier's mod for RimWorld 1.1+ with OkraDonkey's refactoring work. AUTHORS Due to the crazy nature of Steam Workshop modding, crediting the authors of this mod are a bit of a mess.
